title: UNfair banning
body:
I have been banned from league after constant back to back games of trolling. I Feel league doesnt actually review games. The games ive been in have been completely trolled by players yet i get called toxic for calling them out. I would like my ban lifted and my games actually reviewed. Ive been playing league for years and this is absolutely wrong.

here is some chat

Game 1
Deminshi: fiddle gtfo out my lane
Deminshi: dude u are getting reported
Deminshi: report iddle for troll support lane theft top
Deminshi: gg wp
Deminshi: no fuck this idiot
Deminshi: he plans on feeding
Deminshi: hes also staling cs
Deminshi: damn why are people like him alive
Deminshi: fiddle ive met u before u always fiddle support and fail
Deminshi: ure the real troll
Deminshi: report my fiddle please . gg im over this guess we are all stealing roles
Deminshi: this fudckin fiddle is trolling
Deminshi: look now he doesnt even want top
Deminshi: hes just an asshole
Deminshi: look at him he just wants us to lose
Deminshi: simply all report
Deminshi: ill post this recording on league to get him banned
Deminshi: now im behind due to this fiddle gurenteed report
Deminshi: congratz buddy u are getting your own thread
Deminshi: now im struggling for eeasy kills damn. fiddle uninstall
Deminshi: please dont play with people anymore
Deminshi: ^ report this guy please im making a thread ive played with him before he always trolls
Deminshi: ill be adding to the thread and hoping for admin response for perm ban
Deminshi: i dont always play with him idiot i get stuck in matches with him
Deminshi: yea him torlling me out of lane and troll supporting isnt toxic
Deminshi: fiddle its cool they do physical ip bans now
Deminshi: lux u can also recieve a report . since u think its funny
Deminshi: very smart you can't hide your units physical ip
Deminshi: just the static
Deminshi: even a vpn wont save u
Deminshi: so in this thread ill be sure it gets a review with the game recording
Deminshi: gonna have to buy another account off an asain
Deminshi: then mute me lux
Deminshi: your oppinion matters alot to me
Deminshi: lol thats funny because im one too for the USN
Deminshi: also security plus certified
Deminshi: ^ clearly an IT and not a child
Deminshi: cant wait to report you both
Deminshi: that ban is gonna be funn
Deminshi: no lol youre getting a simple report. this diffle is getting the ban
Deminshi: i hope they review and give you atleast a 5 game penalty though
Deminshi: has nothing to do with fiddle torlling me out of lane and taking cs
Deminshi: yea ok
Deminshi: oh shit u get off on typos . i get off on reviews and threads
Deminshi: whats really gonna be sad is when this thread is sent to you via email
Deminshi: lol you really think that 
Deminshi: thats cute
Deminshi: mhmm 
Deminshi: i was trolled out of lane and set back
Deminshi: feel free to report enough reports and they review game
Deminshi: so when i report you and they review the can easily see the ban worthy greif
Deminshi: lol but ure reporting me so if we report eachother they will def review
Deminshi: how about u both report me so they can review
Deminshi: now i know yoru're not an IT cuz u dont know the first thing about hacking
Deminshi: lmfao that was sooo cute
Deminshi: ill report you for the threat though
Deminshi: what are we betting your account
Deminshi: which u wont have soon lol
Deminshi: was over when fiddle set me back
Deminshi: just report him dont worry im making the thread as we speak
Deminshi: ahh so u admit to trolling
Deminshi: good
Deminshi: thats all i needed
Game 2
Deminshi: fml im lagging
Deminshi: base and heal
Deminshi: wow xin gj engaging after i die
Deminshi: fuck me right
Deminshi: xin u suck u oculda killed her
Deminshi: but u were being a pussy
Deminshi: see now u go in after i die
Deminshi: i hope htey kill u
Deminshi: our xin doesnt know team fights all he does is clean up
Deminshi: they love us who knows
Deminshi: lol we lost
Deminshi: cuz im tilted
Deminshi: when everyone wa smid our dumbass jungle wa spushing bot and did almost no damage to tower
Deminshi: then he has a chance to kill jinx
Deminshi: instea dhe hid
Deminshi: im over this game
Deminshi: im not toxic ure a crappy ungle
Deminshi: yaknow what fuck u guys lol im building to destroy not support
Deminshi: and if i see any of u about to die
Deminshi: youre a gonnaer
Deminshi: gonner
Deminshi: no dude its zero gank jungles who dont know how to asisst
Deminshi: u are the reason
Deminshi: do u know how many ganks yis done
Deminshi: and how many ive done
Deminshi: do u know
Deminshi: ^
Deminshi: no dude stfu
Deminshi: i need farm im going to farm
Deminshi: i agreee
Deminshi: i fucking hate bronze and  also hate autofill
Deminshi: xin stfu dude
Deminshi: not going back bot
Deminshi: gg
Deminshi: from bronze 3 back to bronze 5 i go
Deminshi: team after team
Deminshi: no i think zero gank jungles may be the problem
Deminshi: or afk
Deminshi: or lots of people claiming lag
Deminshi: but among them im the reason i got to bronze 3
Deminshi: but fuck it back to bronze 5
Deminshi: i dont even care to win anymore im just ready to end infact
Deminshi: hes a ti
Deminshi: yi
Deminshi: this xin i swear
Deminshi: u know how yi got fed
Deminshi: he was in team fights and ganked constantly
Deminshi: do u know why u arent fed
Deminshi: u ganked zero times
Deminshi: only kills u got was after i died
Deminshi: trying to give u a kill
Deminshi: trying
Deminshi: u zwero gank toxic shit
Deminshi: yep report me for all ure kills
Deminshi: and all your ganks
Deminshi: oh u have no ganks
Deminshi: llol says the man who got all his kills off my death
Deminshi: gg
Deminshi: nope but ill get back to bronze 3
Deminshi: after this match

how do i get banned for being trolled wtf. does riot not actually review and is it just  about that instant bans u with enough reports from trolls.

replies.body: Stop typing so much and play the game. Also this is oce boards not NA...

Maybe threatening to track someone's IP and selling their account isn't the smartest option and flaming is the reason why you would have gotten banned.  /mute all and report after game, don't retaliate that's all they want.  Don't give a reaction and you'll be fine.
u raged, that means its ur own fault....
